entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
